Reviews.Title: Sony Ericsson C702 Cyber-Shot is the Best Cell Phone Ever!
Reviews.Author: Louis A. Prendiz "sony guru"
Reviews.Content: Where do I start?  From the moment that I laid my eyes on Sony Ericsson's C702, I was taken!  The C702 has everything and more than any of the other most sophisticated cell phones can have!  It has GPS and A-GPS capabilities, a great 3.2 MP picture camera, video-recording camera, lighting for both camera modes, GPS-based navigator, Bluetooth capabilities, micro memory card slot, GSM and 3G capabilities, water resistant shell, anti-slip back cover, e-mail, MMS, text, digital radio, MP3 player, and so much more!  One of the features that I really like is the ability to connect to the Internet from a computer through the C702 and its included Sony Ericsson PC Suite software.  I couldn't have wished for a better cell phone!  Don't believe everything bad that people say about this cell phone.  Judge for yourself, if you dare!

Reviews.Title: Sony Ericsson w/cyber shot
Reviews.Author: Amanda Latham
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone while in Kuwait about 6 months ago, first problem I noticed was that the slide cover for the camera keep coming open, still does. The pictures I take with it come out pretty clear, so that's a plus. Sometimes though the phone will freeze up and I will have to shut it down, sometimes the screen will just go black. I bought this phone because I was told it will work with my carrier back in the states (AT&T;). I have not been back to the states to test it out yet, but I think I will just use this as a deployment/emergency phone, and keep my Sony Ericsson 750, that one has yet to give me ANY issues and I've had it for over a year!

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
International quad-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 frequencies and International 3G compatibility via 2100 UMTS/HSDPA plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
Ultra-slim Cyber-shot camera phone with 3.2-megapixel lens and flash; video capture up to 30fps
Blueooth stereo music; Memory Stick Micro expansion; digital audio player with FM radio; access to personal email and instant messaging
Up to 7 hours of talk time, up to 300 hours (12.5 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Ericsson C702i Cyber-shot Unlocked Phone with 3.2 MP Camera, International 3G, Media Player, M2 Memory Slot--U.S. Version with Warranty (Speed Black)
